Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key2: Coaches meetings are scheduled on a weekly basis to discuss the following:-
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key3: Whether they are taking the classes on time or not
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key4: To know about the problems faced by the Coaches.
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key6: Who is good in their group with a name and why?
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key7: Who is struggling or needs more support?
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key9: Documentation of the classes conducted should be done by Coaches only.
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key10: All coaches have to Schedule their classes on academic calendars.
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key11: Which activities we can do in the upcoming week.
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key13: Mentor meetings are also scheduled on a weekly basis to know and discuss the following:-
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key14: What problems are being faced by mentors regarding their mentees?
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key15: Struggling point and strength of mentees
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key16: How much time do they spend guiding their mentees
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key18: Ensure that mentees are coming for regular standups.
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key19: Ensure whether they are taking interviews and filling the progress tracker sheet daily.
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key21: Mentee meetings are also conducted depending on the requirement. In this meeting, we discuss the following:-
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key24: Time is given by the mentor to the mentees.
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key25: How does their mentor support them?
Coach_mentor_mentee_meetings_key26: Discuss whether their mentors take the interview and fill progress tracker sheet on a weekly basis.
